alert.note: Alert for Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 5:08PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dolores and east central San Juan Counties through 545 PM MST... At 507 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Eastland, or 10 miles south of Monticello, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Monticello and Eastland around 525 PM MST. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 58 and 84. U.S. Highway 491 in Colorado between mile markers 65 and 69. U.S. Highway 491 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 17. Colorado 141 between mile markers 3 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River
